original_title: ウルトラギャラクシーファイト ニュージェネレーションヒーローズ
overview: Somewhere on a distant planet, X and Geed were defeated by a pair of black Ultramen who bore their likenesses in appearance. At the same time, an old enemy of Taro named Ultra Dark-Killer targeted both Zero and Grigio, forcing Taro to recruit the New Generation Heroes to stop the League of Darkness.
title: Ultra Galaxy Fight: New Generation Heroes
